Text: Terrible show.  I doubt we'll see a second season.
This show sucks big time. Don't waste your time. It is terrible.
Agreed, it is terrible.  The rip quality is excellent, but the show itself is just awful.

I watched the show on TV, I know it's only been one episode, but it was really bad. The guys have no personality whatsoever, only one can drive. And who tests 3 lamborghinis by having a drag race? thats stupid they are supercars and hypercars. UK top gear would driven across several countries to test them.

finally watched it, sucks big time. Guys got completely no idea about European cars & culture, there were bulls and corrida to introduce Lamborghini, because it's got a bull in the logo, but it's a freakin ITALIAN sportscar! Now c'mon, that's just disrespectful!
Also, their accent is terrible.

I'm just downloading this for a comedy from the reviews above.

TvTeam thanks for the rip as always :)
